attributes.action: Refund all letting fees to past and present tenants
attributes.additional_details: Refunds should be given to tenants new or old who can provide evidence of payment for such fees (i.e invoices)
attributes.background: Letting fees can cost new tenants £1000's before they have even paid the first months rent.This is money given to estate agents for admin, application fees, reference fees & holding fees. Is this not what the workers are paid for?Paper costs etc like any other business should be their responsibility
